definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: come (BH poet. [[אָתָה]]; Palm. ´[[את]]: Haph. Lab:230, Chr-Pal. 0t0 Schulth:Lex.);—

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: bring: Pf. 3 ms. [[הַיְתִי]], (K:l.c.), Da 5:13 (acc. pers. + [[מִן]] loc.); 3 mpl. [[הַיְתִיו ]], acc. rei Da 5:3, so ([[ל]] acc.) v:Da 5:23 (+ [[קֳדָס]] pers.), Da 6:17 ([[ל]] acc. pers.), v:Da 6:25 (acc. pers.); Inf. [[לְהַיְתָיָה]] (so Eg. Aram REvS:361 C) Da 3:13 ([[ל]] acc. pers.), Da 5:2 ([[ל]] acc. rei).

definitions.title: Hêphal
definitions.body: (pass., K:l.c.) be brought: Pf. 3 fs. [[הֵיתַ֫יִת]] (K:§ 47, Beisp. 6, W:CG 225) subj. rei Da 6:18; 3 mpl. [[הֵיתַ֫יוּ]] subj. pers. Da 3:13 (+ [[קֳדָם]] pers.).
